name: BeggarRun
description:
BeggarRun is a old school pixel art game for mobile

This game is an awesome arcade running game featuring retro graphics and quick gameplay.

Description

The beggar no longer begs on the street.

If he doesn't take action now, no one will help him.

Now the fate of beggar is in you hand. Hurry!

Your friends and a new map are waiting for you.

How to play:

Tap once to single sliding

Tap twice to double sliding

Avoid all obstacles.
